DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Trial Safety Monitoring Requirement Patient Compliance Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded response to determine eligibility for clinical trial participation as outlined in the protocol for questions related to patient compliance of safety monitoring requirements of a research study.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Trial Safety Monitoring Requirement Patient Compliance Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes._The state of being certain that adverse effects will not be caused by some agent under defined conditions._The act of observing something (and sometimes keeping a record of it)._Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory._The extent to which a patient conforms to medical advice regarding prescribed regimen, lifestyle, dietary changes, follow-up schedule and other recommendations._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes. Interventions include but are not restricted to drugs, cells and other biological products, surgical procedures, radiologic procedures, devices, behavioral treatments, process-of-care changes, and preventive care.

Concepts.definition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.

Property.preferredName: Safety Monitoring Requirement Patient Compliance Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: The state of being certain that adverse effects will not be caused by some agent under defined conditions.:The act of observing something (and sometimes keeping a record of it).:Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory.:The extent to which a patient conforms to medical advice regarding prescribed regimen, lifestyle, dietary changes, follow-up schedule and other recommendations.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: The state of being certain that adverse effects will not be caused by some agent under defined conditions.
The act of observing something (and sometimes keeping a record of it).
Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory.
The extent to which a patient conforms to medical advice regarding prescribed regimen, lifestyle, dietary changes, follow-up schedule and other recommendations.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: In the opinion of the investi
ReferenceDocuments.description: In the opinion of the investigator, is the patient unable to comply with the safety monitoring requirements of the study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: In the Judgment by the investigator, is the patient unlikely to comply with study procedures, restrictions and requirements?
